author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to KIOXIA for sponsoring this video! You can check out their CD8 Enterprise drives at: https://americas.kioxia.com/en-us/business/ssd/data-center-ssd.html?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=LinusTechTips&utm_campaign=data+center+ssds

Linus' old NAS is a hodgepodge of ancient drives, a very old CPU, and an extremely loud power supply. Also, it's actually 2 servers. Now it's finally time to replace them with awesome CD8 Enterprise drives from KIOXIA, a bunch of hard drives for even more storage, and a new power supply to quiet things down.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1594436-my-home-server-is-really-stupid-and-i-need-to-fix-it/

Check out ServerPart Deals on eBay: https://ebay.us/m9hWB7 
Buy a Seasonic TX-1600 1600W 80+ Titanium PSU: https://geni.us/KQ4I6th 
Buy a Noctua NF-F12 iPPC-2000 Fan: https://geni.us/LRpPt 
Buy a SlimSAS 8i to 2x Oculink 4i Cable on eBay: https://ebay.us/DuMtSS 
Buy a C-Payne PCIe Gen4 Host Adapter Card: https://lmg.gg/XQqeG
Check
title: My Home Server is REALLY Stupid and I Need to Fix It
